problem_text_cn: 如图,大圆的弦AB切小圆于C点,弦AB的长为10cm,则图中圆环的面积等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the chord AB of the great circle is tangent to the small circle at point C, and the length of the chord AB is N_0, then the area of ​​the ring in the figure is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OA、OC,如图,∵大圆的弦AB切小圆于C点,∴OC⊥AB,∴AC=BC=\frac{1}{2}AB=5,在Rt△OAC中,OA²-OC²=AC²=25,∴图中圆环的面积=S_{大圆}-S_{小圆}=π•OA²-πOC²=π(OA²-OC²)=25π(cm²)．故选:B．
